item.title: PyTorch quickstart
item.description: Delip Rao & Brain McMaham. Natural Language Processing with PyTorch: Build Intelligent Language Applications Using Deep Learning. Install pip install torch Tensor def describe(x: torch.Tensor) -> None: print(f"Type: {x.type()}") print(f"Shape: {x.shape}") print(f"Values:\n{x}\n") return None Initialize a tensor import torch describe(torch.Tensor(2,3)) Type: torch.FloatTensor Shape: torch.Size([2, 3]) Values: tensor([[0., 0., 0.], [0., 0., 0.]]) Initialize a tensor with random values torch.rand torch.randn normal distribution describe(torch.rand(2,3)) # describe(torch.randn(2,3)) Type: torch.FloatTensor Shape: torch.Size([2, 3]) Values: tensor([[0.
